<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Curator

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set whether curator can edit in all editing areas (true) or outside of them (false).

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> curatorObj: [[Object]] - Curator module.

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> bool: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>curatorModule [[setCuratorEditingAreaType]] [[true]];</code>
